mapper.select: select from T_SECTORDOC_EXCEL ORDER BY SECTORDOC_ID

select max(SECTORDOC_VERSION) from T_SECTORDOC_EXCEL
where USER_ID=#{_parameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select sectordoc_etitle,SECTORDOC_CTITLE from T_SECTORDOC_EXCEL WHERE SECTORDOC_DISNAME=#{sectorName,jdbcType=OTHER}
AND USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=OTHER}
